titles.title: To direct the United States Postal Service to designate a single, unique ZIP Code for North Plainfield, New Jersey.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 4/29/2015--Introduced. Directs the U.S. Postal Service, not later than 180 days after the enactment of this Act, to designate a single, unique ZIP code applicable to the area encompassing only North Plainfield, New Jersey.
